item.title: Arduino Pi Tip 1 for the week of July 30th
item.description: Arduino Lillypad is a minature version of Arduino that can be used to prototype wearable projects. It can be sewn into the fabric of clothing and connected to sensors and actuators with conductive thread.

item.title: Arduino Pi Tip 2 for the week of July 30th
item.description: Did you know that you can apply power to your Arduino board by using the V in pin. Simply ground the power source to the arduino board and connect the positive of the power source to your V in pin. This will power your Arduino for your project.
